document_data.name: The Great Mountain
document_data.mainbody: The '''Great Mountain''' was a [[divine realm]] within the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]] belonging to [[Grumbar]], the [[power]] of [[elemental earth]].
document_data.Cosmography: This realm existed within the [[Great Wheel cosmology|Great Wheel]] cosmological model.
document_data.Geography: The body of Grumbar took up a great portion of this divine realm, with him being to physically a part of it. Whenever he had need to speak with a visitor, Grumbar would create an elemental pocket that was suitable for their survival, such as a pocket of [[air]]. The visitor would be made to face {{SI|1|mile|long=yes}} high wall, wherein his face would materialize to speak with them. This face was said to look a bit different to each visitor. Some speculated that the face could be that of a mere [[proxy]], rather than Grumbar himself, though there was no way of knowing for certain.
